title: Grant Denyer's daughter Scout is rushed to hospital after being hit in the face with a BUCKET
text:
Grant Denyer's youngest daughter Scout, three, has been rushed to hospital with a tooth injury after being hit in the face with a bucket at daycare.

The Family Feud host's wife Chezzi broke the news on Tuesday, uploading a snap of herself and Scout wearing matching hairnets in a hospital ward.

'We had a little accident at daycare a few weeks back. A bucket collided with Scout’s mouth while she came down a slippery slide,' Chezzi wrote in the caption.

'Her tooth turned black and died': Grant Denyer's wife Chezzi (right) has revealed their daughter Scout, three, (left) has been rushed to hospital after being hit in the face with a BUCKET at daycare

'Her tooth popped through her lip.. but she was a trooper and recovered well. But just in the last few days she was feeling off. Wasn’t eating. Said her tooth was sore,' she continued.

'The tooth had turned black and died, and an infection started near the root. Luckily it’s her baby tooth,' Chezzi went on, adding: 'So a check up at the dentist yesterday showed it needed to come out.. and soon. So that’s what we’re doing today,'

The blonde TV producer confirmed that Scout felt scared before her surgery but is now recovering well.

'We had a little accident at daycare a few weeks back': Grant (left) has been in and out of hospital this year recovering from a back injury, but it was little Scout (right) who was forced to visit a surgeon this week

She also praised the hospital staff for making the experience as stress-free as possible.

Chezzi completed the impassioned essay by admitting that she struggled to keep her emotions in check during the experience, and almost cried while Scout was in surgery.

'I can’t help think of all those families who go through this often. And with serious, sometimes fatal outcomes. I wish I could send you all so much love and strength. I have no idea how you do it. You are simply amazing,' she concluded.

'Oh no. Another Denyer down': It comes six months after Scout's older sister Sailor, seven, (pictured) was rushed to hospital with a broken wrist

It comes six months after Scout's older sister Sailor, seven, was rushed to hospital with a broken wrist.

At the time, Chezzi once again shared the news on Instagram, uploading a snap of Sailor posing in a sling alongside the caption: 'Oh no. Another Denyer down.. It’s really not our year, is it? #runinwithmonkeybars #brokenwrist.'

At the time, Grant was also in hospital recovering from a back injury which he suffered during a DIY project-gone-wrong in the paddock of his property in the NSW central west.
description: Grant Denyer's youngest daughter Scout, three, has been rushed to hospital with a tooth injury after being hit in the face with a bucket at daycare.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
